coded_answer.p: I am writing to complain about the Musical Show 'Over the Rainbow', permormedperformed onat the Circle theatre last week.

To begin with, there were no discounts available, and nobody seemed to be able to explain the reason why. Second, the musical started forty-five minutes laterlate! and, to make matters worse, the actor was not Danny Brook as the advertisement said. The new actor was not as good as Danny Brook, and he did not perform in the show as he should have done.
Finally, I found that the theatre restaurant was closed because there had been problems with one of the ovens.
What was suppousedsupposed to be a perfect evening out turned out to be a disappointing one instead. I am afraid something should be done about this, and I urge you to refund my ticket.
I am looking forward to receiving your response.
It is often said that technology has changed our lives in many ways, and that we live better now. However, technology has also brought many problems to Society.

Technology bringscreates for me a lot of new possibilities every day, and it also makes everything easier. However, there are a lot of negative aspects into the way that technology affects my life. As technology develops so fast, there are always new things to buy, and it also reduces the amount of jobs available, so it is getting hard to find a job.
